content.rendered:
Team TTE was delighted to host Easa Saleh Al Gurg Group (ESAG) Chairperson and MD, Dr. Raja Al Gurg at the new head office. Accompanied by Hamad Al Gurg, CEO Better Life, Abdulrahman Alshaibani, CEO Al Gurg TBA, Mohammed Al Shaibani, Head of Family Office and Omar Al Gurg, Head of Design & Project Manager ESAG Real Estate, the guests of honor were received by GCEO Easa Al Gurg, who gave them a walkthrough of the premises, followed by a celebratory ribbon and cake cutting.

Speaking on the occasion, the CMD congratulated team Technical & Trading Est. (TTE) on the contemporary and human-centric office and wished them a productive, fulfilling and enriching journey ahead.”
